text: David Prinosil was the defending champion but lost in the second round to Roger Federer. Thomas Johansson won in the final 6–3, 6–7(5–7), 6–2 against Fabrice Santoro. ==Seeds== A champion seed is indicated in bold text while text in italics indicates the round in which that seed was eliminated. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==External links== * 2001 Gerry Weber Open Draw Category:2001 Gerry Weber Open
title: 2001 Gerry Weber Open – Singles
